snippet: The release of minutes from Fed policy meetings before the financial storm have revived a standoff from when the Treasury secretary was head of the New York Fed.
abstract: Release of minutes from 2007 Fed policy meetings before financial crisis revives standoff between Timothy F Geitner, Treasury secretary who was then-president of New York Fed, and Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond president Jeffrey M Lacker.
lead_paragraph: The release of minutes from Fed policy meetings before the financial storm have revived a standoff from when the Treasury secretary was head of the New York Fed.

headline.main: Transcripts Revive a Tiff of Two Fed Presidents
headline.print_headline: Transcripts Revive a Tiff Of Two Fed Presidents
